header.title: 台灣 PHP 年度研討會 2016/10/29 隆重登場

announce.title: PHPConf Taiwan 2016 講題議程投稿
announce.content: 大會從即日起開始接受講題議程投稿，任何與 PHP 語言相關的主題，不論是您的作品想要發表、或是對特定主題的深入研究，都歡迎大家踴躍投稿，一起讓 PHP 社群更加成長、茁壯。請點選 議程投稿 。

announce.title: PHPConf Taiwan 2016 徵求贊助
announce.content: 如果貴公司/單位對於 PHPConf Taiwan 2016 活動贊助感興趣 ，請在此留下您的聯絡方式，我們會儘快與您連繫。

vision.content:
PHP 一直以來都是網頁開發者後端入門首選。因為 PHP 易學、易用，而且參考資源相當豐富，是目前後端佔有率最高的語言。PHP 因為過去的包袱，默默的承受不少誤解。隨著 PHP 7 的推出，執行效率大幅提升的同時，PHP 也逐漸的脫胎換骨，不再是大家心中的那個義大利麵程式碼。

因此今年我們將主題聚焦在現代化的 PHP 開發方式，以及軟體測試，並邀請到了 Modern PHP 這本書的作者 Josh Lockhart 來分享新一代的 PHP 開發方式。同時也邀請到 PHPUnit 這套知名的測試框架作者 Sebastian Bergmann 來為我們介紹如何撰寫測試。

此外今年我們新增了 Workshop 議程，希望藉由做中學，帶領大家建構 CI / CD 環境。

morning.place: 國璽樓 一樓多功能國際會議廳

content.title: More Than Code
content.speaker: Josh Lockhart
content.outline: History of Author of Modern PHP
content.detail: osh is Special Projects Director at New Media Campaigns, a web design, development, and marketing agency in Carrboro, North Carolina USA. He's worked for New Media Campaigns since 2007 and spearheads development for many of NMC’s most advanced client and internal projects. When he's not sitting in front of a computer, Josh is probably out shooting with his camera.

content.title: Lately in PHP(Unit)
content.speaker: Sebastian Bergmann
content.outline: Long gone are the times when developers had to wait years to get their hands on new versions of PHP itself and tools such as PHPUnit.
content.detail: The PHP project releases a version with new features every year and the PHPUnit project every eight weeks. Join Sebastian Bergmann, creator and maintainer of PHPUnit, for a recap of what is new in PHP 7.0 and PHP 7.1 as well as PHPUnit 5 and PHPUnit 6.

afternoon.place1: 國璽樓 一樓多功能國際會議廳
afternoon.place2: 國璽樓 二樓多功能國際會議廳

content.title: Rebuild flyingV with Laravel
content.speaker: Karl
content.outline: flyingV 是目前台灣最大的群眾募資平台，在 flyingV 上，你可以找到許多值得參與的計劃，並與奮力向前的提案者們，一起跨越理想與現實的交界。 我們正在打造一個環境，讓不限領域的創意，能更容易地實踐。
content.detail: flyingV 在今年中迎向一次大改版，這次的改版我們選擇了 Laravel 5.2 作為系統的核心，利用 Laravel 龐大的社群資源以及官方的生態圈進行開發，同時也對現有系統架構做調整。在這個議程中將提到我們如何利用這些資源進行有效率的開發，以及在途中踩雷的心路歷程。

content.title: 使用 Slim 為 Legacy Code 重構
content.speaker: 周建毅
content.outline: 在歷史包袱沉重的公司裡， RD 常抱著肝哭喊著要重構、要換框架、甚至砍掉重練。
content.detail: 但公司營運考量的結果，九成九都要 RD 繼續爆肝開發新功能，而不願大改架構。本演講將介紹如何應用 Slim 和實踐 CI ，來讓 RD 可以方便地同時重構和維護 Legacy Code 。

content.title: 用 Laravel + Vue.js 打造即時資訊看板
content.speaker: 大澤木小鐵
content.outline: 打造即時資訊看板已經是現代化 Web 框架的基本能力了，尤其 Laravel 更是在這方便著墨頗深；
content.detail: 本議程將要探討，要打造一個即時資訊看板，其背後所需要瞭解的系統架構基本原理，以及它會用到 Laravel 與 Vue.js 的哪些特色，適合已經學會 Laravel 的朋友聆聽。

content.title: 敏捷估算模型-變化當下最佳化策略
content.outline: 瞭解專案時程為什麼delay，為什麼時程總估不準 ?
content.detail: 當專案面臨「插件」、「時程調整」、「priority調整」、「需求異動」、「作法異動」、「人員異動」時，該怎麼透過數據評估影響範圍，以便迅速制訂最佳化決策。

workshop.place: 國璽樓 一樓多功能國際會議廳

content.title: 自動化驗收測試實戰
content.speaker: Oomusou
content.outline: 隨著單元測試與整合測試自動化後，最後一哩路的驗收測試該如何自動化呢？
content.detail: 本 workshop 將帶著大家將自動化測試的環境建立起來，並實際撰寫整合測試，為將來 CI 自動化測試鋪路。

content.title: 持續整合與自動化測試實作工作坊
content.speaker: 陳正瑋
content.detail: CI/CD講解詳細說明,可性自東有只爸成話以公，方近的在樂果說實企野領於；他而往離而停一師，吃魚感很有受場己師信服爸理山，是通我。的聽界上所聽，人原走深管我可式次金人史回人居能廣非早可是分方樓求值件飛滿業視陽沒作影裡小問土回下動西。

content.title: Author of Modern PHP2
content.speaker: Josh Lockhart
content.outline: History of Author of Modern PHP
content.detail: osh is Special Projects Director at New Media Campaigns, a web design, development, and marketing agency in Carrboro, North Carolina USA. He's worked for New Media Campaigns since 2007 and spearheads development for many of NMC’s most advanced client and internal projects. When he's not sitting in front of a computer, Josh is probably out shooting with his camera.

content.title: The Creator of PHPUnit2
content.speaker: Sebastian Bergmann
content.detail: Sebastian Bergmann has instrumentally contributed to transforming PHP into a reliable platform for large-scale, critical projects. Enterprises and PHP developers around the world benefit from the tools that he has developed and the experience he shares

location.name: 輔仁大學國璽樓
location.address: 新北市新莊區中正路510號
location.description1: 輔大校門進入直行至最後端至中美堂，左轉第2棟有玻璃帷幕之新大樓即為國璽樓
location.description2: 自輔大貴子門進入，右轉第一棟大樓即為國璽樓。(現場將有場務人員舉牌引導方向)

0.name: Josh Lockhart
0.brief:
Author of Modern PHP (O’Reilly).
Founder of Slim Framework and PHP The Right Way.
0.intro:
Josh is Special Projects Director at New Media Campaigns, a web design, development, and marketing agency in Carrboro, North Carolina USA. He's worked for New Media Campaigns since 2007 and spearheads development for many of NMC’s most advanced client and internal projects. When he's not sitting in front of a computer, Josh is probably out shooting with his camera.

Josh is the author of Modern PHP, published by O'Reilly Media. He started the Slim Framework, a popular PHP micro framework that enables rapid web application and API development. Josh also started and currently curates PHP The Right Way, a popular initiative in the PHP community that encourages good practices and disseminates quality information for PHP developers around the world.

Josh graduated from the Information and Library Science program at the University of North Carolina at Chapel Hill in 2008 and currently reside in Chapel Hill, North Carolina USA with his wife and two dogs.

0.name: Sebastian Bergmann
0.intro: Sebastian Bergmann has instrumentally contributed to transforming PHP into a reliable platform for large-scale, critical projects. Enterprises and PHP developers around the world benefit from the tools that he has developed and the experience he shares

diamondsponsors.name: 鑽石級贊助
diamondsponsors.desc:
Gandi (管地) 是域名註冊商及雲端主機服務供應商。直至今日管地已經管理近兩百萬個域名 (而這些成果使我們成為全球頂尖的域名註冊商之一), 提供超過七百種後綴域名註冊 (如 .cafe, .taipei, .tw, .club, .asia等)。管地也支持很多開源專案 (Gnome, Debian, Ubuntu, Let's Encrypt)。我們很樂意用我們的資源來支持您的開源計畫，馬上跟我們聯絡。

每一個在管地的域名都可以享有：
  • 1 年免費的 SSL 憑證
  • 5 個郵件信箱與 1G 空間
  • 1000 個轉址設定
  • 隱藏註冊人資訊
  • Gandi 簡易代管主機半價優惠 (可安裝 Wordpress, Drupal 等)
Visit us: www.gandi.net
